item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573906801
item.description: Public use of any portable music system is a virtually guaranteed indicator of sociopathic tendencies. – Zoso

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573902207
item.description: Absolutely nothing should be concluded from these figures except that no conclusion can be drawn from them. – Joseph L. Brothers, Linux/PowerPC Project)

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573901107
item.description: If God had a beard, he’d be a UNIX programmer.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573900670
item.description: A Los Angeles judge ruled that “a citizen may snore with immunity in his own home, even though he may be in possession of unusual and exceptional ability in that particular field.”

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573900486
item.description: The church is near but the road is icy; the bar is far away but I will walk carefully. – Russian Proverb

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573900258
item.description: Let’s call it an accidental feature. –Larry Wall

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573899688
item.description: Abou Ben Adhem (may his tribe increase!) Awoke one night from a deep dream of peace, And saw, within the moonlight in his room, Making it rich, and like a lily in bloom, An angel writing in a book of gold. Exceeding peace had made Ben Adhem bold, And to the presence in the room he said, “What writest thou?” The vision raised its head, And with a look made of all sweet accord, Answered, “The names of those who love the Lord.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573899601
item.description: Chicago law prohibits eating in a place that is on fire.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 16 1573899597
item.description: It destroys one’s nerves to be amiable every day to the same human being. – Benjamin Disraeli

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573824301
item.description: You are fairminded, just and loving.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573823701
item.description: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning, and does not stop until you get to work.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573823592
item.description: Q: How do you make Windows run faster? A: Throw it harder!

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573823401
item.description: People are very flexible and learn to adjust to strange surroundings – they can become accustomed to read Lisp and Fortran programs, for example. - Leon Sterling and Ehud Shapiro, Art of Prolog, MIT Press

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573821901
item.description: Lieberman’s Law: Everybody lies, but it doesn’t matter since nobody listens.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573820909
item.description: Being overloaded is the sign of a true Debian maintainer.

item.title: Post at 2019 11 15 1573800772
item.description: A homeowner’s reach should exceed his grasp, or what’s a weekend for?
